com.developmentontheedge.beans

Interface EventConstants


  • public interface EventConstants

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String EVT_DISPLAY_NAME
      Used to indicate the display name of the property has changed
      static String EVT_PROPERTY_ADDED
      This flag is used by dynamic and indexed properties when new element was added.
      static String EVT_PROPERTY_REMOVED
      This flag is used by dynamic and indexed properties when new element was removed.
      static String EVT_READ_ONLY
      Used to indicate the read-only attribute of the property has changed
      static String EVT_SET_VALUE
      The EVT_XXXXXXXXXXXXX flags are intended to be postfixed to property names when events like PropertyChangeEvent are fired.
      static String EVT_VISIBILITY_CHANGE
      This must be postfixed to property name when visiblity flag is changed at runtime using setHidden.

    • Field Detail

      • EVT_SET_VALUE

        static final String EVT_SET_VALUE
        The EVT_XXXXXXXXXXXXX flags are intended to be postfixed to property names when events like PropertyChangeEvent are fired. This allows the component developer to pass some extra information to PropertyInspector so it can utilize the event to redisplay the bean. In a nutshell it is used to indicate changes of meta information about the properties rather than property values.
        The only exclusion is EVT_SET_VALUE flag which means the same thing as no flag at all.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EVT_PROPERTY_ADDED

        static final String EVT_PROPERTY_ADDED
        This flag is used by dynamic and indexed properties when new element was added.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EVT_PROPERTY_REMOVED

        static final String EVT_PROPERTY_REMOVED
        This flag is used by dynamic and indexed properties when new element was removed.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EVT_READ_ONLY

        static final String EVT_READ_ONLY
        Used to indicate the read-only attribute of the property has changed
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EVT_DISPLAY_NAME

        static final String EVT_DISPLAY_NAME
        Used to indicate the display name of the property has changed
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EVT_VISIBILITY_CHANGE

        static final String EVT_VISIBILITY_CHANGE
        This must be postfixed to property name when visiblity flag is changed at runtime using setHidden.
        See Also:
